**User:**
I've been hearing about the Verus v0.7.2-1 update. Is it mandatory for all users?

**AI Assistant:**
No, the update is not mandatory for all users. It is a non-mandatory but highly recommended upgrade. It's always a good idea to stay up-to-date with the latest version, but you won't be forced to update if you don't want to.

**User:**
I've got a specific question about the update. Will I be able to recover a revoked ID without updating to v0.7.2?

**AI Assistant:**
No, you won't be able to recover a revoked ID without updating to v0.7.2. This update fixes an issue that may occur in an edge case of revocation and recovery of IDs, which can result in a revoked ID being irrecoverable from an earlier version than v0.7.2. So, if you want to make sure you can recover revoked IDs, it's a good idea to update to v0.7.2.
